Naturally rich in plant-based protein, fiber, and essential folate, they support gut health, heart function, and steady, sustaining energy you can feel throughout the day. Made with one ingredient and no additives, SIMPLi Green Lentils are a clean, dependable pantry staples.

name: Sadaf Red Lentils Dry 24 oz - Dried lentils bulk - Red Lentil beans - Natural, Vegan, Kosher, Halal
short_description: 100% NATURAL: Sadaf Dried Red Lentils are only natural dry red lentils. No preservatives or fillers in the package. Red lentils are also known as Lentejas rojas, Lal Masoor Dahl or Dahl lentils.
MANY USES: Ready in minutes, red lentils break down easily and are therefore the ideal choice for stews, soups, sauces, dahl and curries.
NUTRITIOUS: Red lentils are a great protein-rich food for vegans and vegetarians and provide a tasty source of Dietary Fiber and Vitamin B.
SHORTER COOKING TIME: These lentils have shorter cooking time than other lentils, and tend to quickly become soft, making them an ideal for soups and stews.
GREAT QUALITY: Raw agricultural dry red lentils of the best grade obtainable. Vegan, Halal, and RCC Kosher. Packed on shared equipment with wheat, nuts, and soy. Packed in the USA
